Control.Name: Copy
Control.Tooltip: /kcopy to macro.

Control.Name: Paste
Control.Tooltip: /kpaste to macro.

Control.Name: Clone
Control.Tooltip: Fetches an item from crate or vendor. /kclone to macro. Hold shift to ignore colors.

Control.Name: Position
Control.Tooltip: Transform (position)

Control.Name: Diff
Control.Tooltip: Find the difference between "from" and "to" and apply the same change to the selected decor. /kdiff to macro.

Control.Name: FixLinks
Control.Tooltip: Fix any link cycles on plot. Click this if you have decor that crashes your client when you select it. /kfixlinks to macro.

Control.Name: Average
Control.Tooltip: Set the selected decor to the average between "from" and "to". /kaverage to macro.

Control.Name: FixChairs
Control.Tooltip: Correct all interactables on the plot (not just chairs). /kfixchairs to macro.

Control.Name: Target
Control.Tooltip: All use of Diff or Average will affect the targeted decor if available, instead of the selected decor. /ktarget to macro.

Control.Name: Place
Control.Tooltip: /kplace to macro.

Control.Name: Parent
Control.Tooltip: Select parent decor. /kselectparent to macro.

Control.Name: Crate
Control.Tooltip: Hold shift to crate all children as well. /kcrate or /kcratelink to macro.

Control.Name: AutoLink
Control.Tooltip: If activated, all decor created or changed will automatically link to the target. You can also use /kltt to link a single selected decor to the target.

Control.Name: Menu
Control.Tooltip: /katiadecor to macro.

Control.Name: FixGhosts
Control.Tooltip: Fix any ghosts on plot. Click this if you have decor that can't be selected. /kfixghosts to macro.

Control.Name: List
Control.Tooltip: Left click to select and preview, right click to visit

Control.Name: Update
Control.Tooltip: Update using the pasted code.

Control.Name: Code
Control.Tooltip: Paste the update code here.

Control.Name: Visit
Control.Tooltip: Visit the selected plot.

Control.Name: Report
Control.Text: Report local RP activity to other KBT users

Control.Name: Renown
Control.Tooltip: Remove everything in crate that costs this much or less renown.

Control.Name: Clean
Control.Tooltip: Clean specified decor from crate.

Control.Name: Cash
Control.Tooltip: Remove everything in crate that costs this much or less cash.

Form.Name: RPListItem
Form.Tooltip: Left click to select and preview, right click to place, shift click to make this item the parent.

Control.Name: Question
Control.Text: The RP Panel listens to reports from other KBT users to show you which RP plots currently have high activity. Would you like to set KBT to tell other users when there is RP activity around you? (The more people do this, the more accurate the RP activity display will be! â™¥)

Control.Name: Yes
Control.Tooltip: Add selected item to the set. /kadd to macro.

Control.Name: No
Control.Tooltip: Add selected item to the set. /kadd to macro.

Control.Name: List
Control.Tooltip: Left click to select and preview, right click to place

Control.Name: Terms
Control.Tooltip: Search terms separated by spaces.

Control.Name: MaxResults
Control.Tooltip: Search terms separated by spaces.

Control.Name: SelectedJabbit
Control.Tooltip: Search terms separated by spaces.
